data.title: Charles Hutton Obituary 2007
data.meta_description: Charles Edward Hutton         A private family service will be held Charles Hutton, 61, of Roswell who passed away on May 29, 2007 at Eastern New Mexico Medical Center. Charles...
data.text:
Charles Edward Hutton

A private family service will be held Charles Hutton, 61, of Roswell who passed away on May 29, 2007 at Eastern New Mexico Medical Center. Charles was cremated per his wishes.

Charles was born July 16, 1945 in Larned, Kansas to Harold Edward Hutton and Geneva McDonald Hutton. Both parents have preceded him in death.

On February 2, 1966 Charles married Janice Winona Kalberg in Canoga Park, California. She has preceded him death.

In his younger years Charles was in the Navy- USNR, he received a National Defense Service Medal while serving his country. He worked as a machinist in Long Beach, California prior to moving to Roswell. Charles had recently retired and became a member of Apostolic Bible Church. He was also a member of Apostolic Tabernacle Church in Long Beach before moving to Roswell.

Charles is survived by his three daughters: Catherine Marie Taani of Southgate, Ca, Christine Louise Hutton of Anaheim, Ca and Erin Michelle Hutton of Long Beach Ca; and two brothers: Kim Ryan Hutton and Tim Bryan Hutton both of Roswell. Charles is also survived by his ten grandchildren. Charles will be missed dearly by his family and his friends.

Arrangements have been entrusted to the care of Ballard Funeral Home and Crematory. An online registry can be accessed at www.ballardfuneralhome.com
